title: NCAA TournaTrends 3/18: NCAA, Tim Pool, The Crown Act, Good Trouble, NFL, NYT
itunes:title: NCAA TournaTrends 3/18: NCAA, Tim Pool, The Crown Act, Good Trouble, NFL, NYT
description:
In this edition of NCAA TournaTrends, Jack and Miles discuss the NCAA Tournament, Tim Pool being... impatient?, the Crown Act, the "Good Trouble" LAPD sweep, NFL news, and the NYT's 'Free Speech Problem'.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
